content: subscribe to my newsletter to receive a discount instantly and on all new patterns www outstandingcrochet com 1 this straightforward pattern is accompanied by a comprehensive video tutorial detailed written instructions and a helpful chart throughout the project you ll master some impressive crochet techniques 1 magic_ring 2 seamless double_crochet join 3 backwards single_crochet edging **skill level ** * beginner **size ** * diameter 10cm/ 4 **materials and tools ** *yarn * * worsted/ aran/ 10ply weight yarn such as scheepjes stone washed xl 70% cotton x 30% acrylic 50g/ 75m/ 82yds 45g for 6 coasters in 869 obsidian *other materials * * crochet hooks 4 5mm and 5 5mm for edging tapestry needle get 10% off on $15 order - enter coupon code save10 get 15% off on $25 order - enter coupon code save15 get 20% off on $50 order - enter coupon code save20 **terms of use ** © 2023 all rights reserved the entirety of this publication including all documents remains the sole property of natalia kononova reproduction of any part of this publication in any form or by any means is strictly prohibited additionally no videos may be created or produced based on this pattern the use of my patterns for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited you may sell finished items based on my patterns please follow this regulations 1 keep a copy of your receipt as proof of purchase 2 items must be made only by the buyer 4 give credentials to natalia kononova at www outstandingcrochet com as the pattern designer on a tag affixed to each item and in the listing if selling on-line 5 you may make alterations to the pattern but you must still link to the original pattern and credit natalia kononova at www outstandingcrochet com on the item s tags and listings thank you thank you for respecting the copyright law best wishes to you and happy crocheting natalia
